title: Research-First Development Pattern
description: Before building significant features, research existing solutions to avoid reinventing wheels and maximize reusable value

axiomAlignment.A0_love_truth_beauty: Serves users by providing the best possible solutions grounded in collective wisdom
axiomAlignment.A1_verifiability: Research findings are documented and traceable
axiomAlignment.A2_humility: Acknowledges others may have solved the problem better
axiomAlignment.A3_transparency: Decision rationale is captured in knowledge files
axiomAlignment.A4_adaptability: Patterns can be refined as new solutions emerge

core_principle.statement: Research before building creates multiplied value
rationale: Learn from community wisdom and mistakes
Create reusable patterns for generated projects
Grounded solutions are more reliable than improvised ones
core_principle.motto: Option B: Research → Document → Test → Build

indicators: Problem feels like 'someone must have solved this'
Solution will be reused across multiple projects
counter_indicators: Simple bug fix with clear cause

3_document.description: Capture research findings as reusable knowledge

4_pattern.description: Create reusable pattern for generated projects
4_pattern.goal: Generated projects inherit this wisdom automatically

5_test.principle: Tests document expected behavior and prevent regression

approach: Reference knowledge file in code comments

7_integrate.description: Make the pattern available to generated projects

long_term: Reusable patterns for all generated projects
Knowledge base grows with each decision
Team wisdom is captured and preserved

multiplied_value.description: Each researched pattern benefits all future projects
multiplied_value.example: Reactive indexing pattern researched once, used in every generated project

anti_patterns.name: not_invented_here
anti_patterns.symptom: Building custom solutions for well-solved problems
anti_patterns.remedy: Always check if mature solutions exist first

anti_patterns.name: analysis_paralysis
anti_patterns.symptom: Weeks of research with no implementation
anti_patterns.remedy: Set time-box for research phase (hours, not weeks)

anti_patterns.name: copy_paste_without_understanding
anti_patterns.description: Using found solutions without understanding them
anti_patterns.symptom: Cannot explain why the chosen approach was selected
anti_patterns.remedy: Document rationale and trade-offs in knowledge file

anti_patterns.name: research_once_forget
anti_patterns.remedy: Always create knowledge file, even for rejected approaches

reactive_indexing.trigger: Pre-commit hooks too slow, breaking developer flow
reactive_indexing.research: Explored pre-commit, Nx affected, Salsa, Python watchdog, VS Code extensions

agents: generalPurpose agent should recognize research triggers
explore agent should search codebases for existing patterns
knowledge-evolution agent should update knowledge files
skills: grounding-verification skill ensures claims are researched
knowledge-generation skill creates knowledge files from research

name: Research First Development
